author: Mother Teresa
quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples.

author: Anne Frank
quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.

author: Michael Jordan
quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.

author: Josiah Gilbert Holland
quote: Calmness is the cradle of power.

author: Brian Tracy
quote: Set peace of mind as your highest goal, and organize your life around it.

author: Publilius Syrus
quote: Anyone can hold the helm when the sea is calm.

author: Gabrielle Reece
quote: Stay calm and aggressive.

author: Walt Disney
quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.

author: Les Brown
quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.

author: William James
quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.

author: Harriet Tubman
quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.

author: Walt Whitman
quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.

author: Mark Twain
quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible!'

author: Confucius
quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.

author: Helen Keller
quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.

author: Rumi
quote: The wound is the place where the light enters you.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: Les Brown
quote: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: The future depends on what you do today.

author: Robin Sharma
quote: Don't live the same year 75 times and call it a life.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying basic fundamentals.

author: Mae Jemison
quote: Never limit yourself because of others’ limited imagination; never limit others because of your own limited imagination.
